name: Harvey Ugonna Ezihe
about_me: I am a passionate and skilled fullstack developer with a knack for crafting elegant solutions to complex problems. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I thrive on bringing ideas to life through code. My journey in software development has equipped me with a diverse skill set, enabling me to create robust, scalable, and user-friendly web applications.

what_i_do.what_i_do: Fullstack development, Front End development, Back End development and Database administration

projects.name: AI note taking app
projects.description: Revolutionize your notetaking. Our AI-powered app makes finding information easy. Effortlessly retrieve insights from your saved notes, simplifying your experience and boosting productivity.

projects.name: London Underground Journey planner
projects.description: A fully functional, real-time journey planner for the London Underground Trains, using TFL API

projects.name: Fully functional e-commerce website
projects.description: A packed e-commerce project with functionality to add new products, sign in with google, offline cart that merges with online cart when you sign in, pagination, recent product hero page, etc.

projects.name: Shopify store
projects.description: Real world project for a client, providing a fully functional e-commerce fashion website. Capable of user registration, checkout, marketing emails, etc. Built using Shopify.

projects.name: Rawg.io website clone
projects.description: A fully responsive remastered version of rawg.io, using ReactJS and Chakra UI, with full functionality. Data is being fetched from rawg.io API.

projects.name: Fully featured blog
projects.description: A fully featured and functional RESTful Blog which allows user registration, post creation, comments, user specific privileges and more.

skills.skills: Vanilla Javascript, NextJS 14, React 18, Typescript, Python, Docker, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, SQL/NoSQL, TailwindCSS, Git/GitHub, etc

qualifications.certification: 100 Days of Code: The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Civil Engineering
Post Graduate Degree in Oil and Gas Engineering
